Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Alissa: Isn't this view wonderful, love?...$l"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Alissa "All my life, I never thought that I could be as confident and happy as I am right now...$l#$b#You don't know how much you've made my life as beautiful, or even more, as this view...$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Alissa 3/pause 300/speak Alissa "I'm happy and contented, @...$l#$b#Thank you...$l#$b#I love you...$l
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Corine: Hey... I didn't expect you to find me here.$l"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Corine 3/emote Corine 20/speak Corine "Hey, no... I wanted you to find me.$l"/emote farmer 20/speak Corine "A lot of stuff has happened in my life.#$b#But whatever and however those events affected my life, All I know is they led me to you.$h"/faceDirection Corine 0/emote Corine 60/speak Corine "...and...$l"/faceDirection Corine 3/pause 300/speak Corine "I wouldn't want it any other way...$l
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Flor: *Giggles*$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Flor 3/pause 300/speak Flor "Oh, hello honey. sure am glad to see you!$h#$b#Why don’t you come and join me for a bit.$l"/faceDirection Flor 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Flor "It’s kind of funny, isn’t it?#$b#*Giggles* We both kind of started this friendship while I was wearing a towel.$h#$b#We had such fascinating interactions with one another...#$b#Eventually, I fell for you...$l"/faceDirection Flor 1/emote Flor 60/faceDirection Flor 3/pause 300/speak Flor "Bu-but...$l#$b#I-I don't mind at all...$l#$b#I'm happy because you're in my life...$l#$b#And how we live our life...$h#$b#I am grateful...$l
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Maddie: Ah...$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Madde 3/pause 300/speak Maddie "What brings you here babe? Miss me that much?$6#$b#Just kidding, come over here you!$h"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Maddie 0/pause 500/speak Maddie "The view’s stunning, isn’t it? But I’m sure it doesn’t hold a torch to how beautiful you've made my life...$6"/faceDirection Maddie 3/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 20/pause 500/faceDirection Maddie 0/speak Maddie "On a more serious note, I was thinking about the years that have gone by.#$b#We grew so much, who would’ve thought you’d break the ice queen huh?$h#$b#Okay, I’d like to tell you something and this’ll be a one time thing only okay?$l"/faceDirection Maddie 3/pause 300/speak Maddie "I know I’m not that showy, nor am I clingy. But I’d just like to tell you that I’m very grateful to have you in my life.$l#$b#Life would be drab without you in it, and with you, I feel content.$l#$b#I love you so much, @!
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Ysabelle: The view’s breathtaking isn’t it, love?$h/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/pause 300/speak Ysabelle "I’m undeniably lucky to have you here with me.$l"/emote farmer 20/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/pause 300/speak Ysabelle "I couldn’t imagine surviving the past %year years without you.$6#$b#It wouldn’t have been as fun rediscovering myself and learning about new things if you weren’t there with me.$l"/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Ysabelle 20/speak Ysabelle "Thank you, love. For being patient with me.$l#$b#And for making me feel like everything is possible.$h"/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/pause 300/speak Ysabelle "You made me realize that it’s never too late to fight for what you want.#$b#To go at your own pace and to block out everyone else’s opinion.$6"/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Ysabelle "Without you, I wouldn’t be who I am now.$l#$b#Thank you for everything, love.$h#$b#You’ll always be my greatest blessing.$l
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Jeric: Oh, hey babe!$h#$b#I missed you!$7"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 20/speak Jeric "Oh, nothing. I was just thinking about how far we’ve come.$l#$b#Couldn’t have survived it without my best guy!$l^Couldn’t have survived it without my best gal!$l"/faceDirection Jeric 3/emote Jeric 20/speak Jeric "You know, you’re the best thing that happened to this town.$l#$b#Everything seemed to liven up when you arrived!$h#$b#I really am glad to call you mine!$l"/faceDirection Jeric 0/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/speak Jeric "Here’s to our best lifetime @!$h
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Kenneth: You may be easy on the eyes, but you walk loudly my @.$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 12/faceDirection Kenneth 3/speak Kenneth "Haha! Just kidding! You know I like to mess with you sometimes.$l#$b#Seeing your face all scrunched up like that is still the best view in the world.$h#$b# Even more beautiful than the view in front of us now.$l face view I was just thinking about the years that have gone by.#$b#I kinda feel nostalgic right now.$7#$b#But you know what?..."/emote farmer 8/speak Kenneth "Out of all the things that have happened over the years, I am most thankful for you.$l or $7#$b#Your presence has lit up the entire town with your radiance.$l#$b#I’m incredibly blessed that I get to share each day with you.$l#$b#Here’s to our happiness @! I’m excited for what our future holds!$h Is this okay?$l
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Philip: Ah! Isn't the view majestic?$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/faceDirection Philip 3/pause 300/speak Philip "@...$l#$b#Heh, I just want to say...$l#$b#I'm happy. And you're a huge reason why I am.$h"/emote farmer 20/emote Philip 20/speak Philip "Whatever happens, I'll always be by your side.$h#$b#I love you!$h
